name: TITANIC Shipwreck Exploration
description: Titanic Shipwreck Exploration is a diving simulator and immersive interactive story. With over 6 hours of game-play it you will leave with a greater understanding of the historic tragedy that unfolded in 1912 leading to the sinking of the worlds most famous ship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GT 8500 or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or Above DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 6 GB available space
